summary: oligonucleotide microarray comprises 16 identical subarrays for rapid detection of avian viruses. avian influenza virus (AIV), Newcastle disease virus (NDV), infection bronchitis virus (IBV) and infectious bursal disease virus (IBDV) in single- and mixed-virus infections. method for rapid diagnosis of avian viral diseases that several times shortens duration of assay versus classical diagnostic methods is proposed.
